statements: SELECT * FROM attractions;

SELECT a.name AS Attraction, ac.name AS Activity, comments AS Recommendations FROM attractions a JOIN recommendations r ON a.attraction_id = r.attraction_id JOIN activities ac ON r.activity_id = ac.activity_id;
